oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LARGE VERIFICATION TESTS ON ROCK SLOPE STABILITY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: van der Meer, J.W.
Pilarczyk, K.W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rock slope
slope stability
verification tests
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A number of large scale tests on stability of rock slopes and gravel beaches is described and compared with small scale test results. The following topics are treated: the stability of a rock armour layer, the profile formation of a berm breakwater, the profile formation of gravel beaches, including ripple formation, and reflection and overtopping on rock slopes. The general conclusion is that scale effects could not be found.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 157
